column4: I opened a folder with banshee once, and now, all of my folders are being opened in banshee (e.g. when I click on the home folder on the Desktop)
I opened a folder with banshee once, and now, all of my folders are being opened in banshee (e.g. when I click on the home folder on the Desktop) any help to make it open with nautilus again?
right click on the folder and Open with other applications and select file browser
but I want to make it the default way to open folders (the default one is banshee right now)
